Tiket masuk murah, tempatnya bersih terawat, dan sangat mengagumkan

Semoga terus berkembang dan banyak pengunjung serta menjadi tempat yang lestari

name: Mr Amar
text: It's a nice place to have a little rest, after we a long journey from Banyuwangi or before we back to bwi. It's a view of blue sea along the side of the road, with a shadow of hills & tree and nice breeze wind coming from the sea. We have a rest and a lunch from our lunch box. Well... Come and visit...
